'''Ancient Scarlet-Plume Finch''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be obtained using the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] on an [[Ancient Scarlet-Plume Finch]] in Teyvat.
